sourcesContent:
import { TableWidget, LineChartWidget, PieChartWidget, DonutChartWidget, BarChartWidget, AreaChartWidget, TableWidgetSettings, LineChartWidgetSettings, PieChartWidgetSettings, DonutChartWidgetSettings, BarChartWidgetSettings, AreaChartWidgetSettings, TextFieldWidget, TextFieldWidgetSettings } from '../components/widgets' const decideWidgetSettings = (addType, onWidgetAdd) => { switch (addType) { case 'Table': return case 'Line Chart': return case 'Bar Chart': return case 'Pie Chart': return case 'Donut Chart': return case 'Area Chart': return case 'Text Field': return default: return
} } const decideWidget = (widget) => { switch (widget.type) { case 'Table': return case 'Line Chart': return case 'Bar Chart': return case 'Pie Chart': return case 'Donut Chart': return case 'Area Chart': return case 'TextField': return } } export { decideWidgetSettings, decideWidget }
